fields.name: time_ISO8601
fields.title: Date time
fields.description: Date and time at the end of each time interval of one hour in the ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+00:00 [UTC]

fields.name: cyclone_flag
fields.title: Cyclone flag
fields.description: mask of occurrence (1) or not (0) of surface cyclones along the ACE track
